FuncDef:
The segment-routing mpls static adj-sid advertise command enables a device to advertise static adjacency labels.
The undo segment-routing mpls static adj-sid advertise command disables a device from advertising static adjacency labels.
By default, a device is disabled to advertise static adjacency labels.
CLIs: undo segment-routing mpls static adj-sid advertise
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In SR-MPLS TE, adjacency labels are dynamically generated and advertised by an IGP. To enable a device to advertise static adjacency labels that are manually configured, run the segment-routing mpls static adj-sid advertise command.
Prerequisites
Segment routing has been enabled for a specific IS-IS topology using the segment-routing mpls command.
